name: sba-gov-content-api-api
description: the api for searching the website content

scripts.test-local: EVENTS_HOSTNAME=wakizashi.mint.ussba.io EVENTS_API_ENDPOINT=event-list/drupal7-events-api.json CLOUDSEARCH_OFFICE_ENDPOINT=search-mint-offices-mjhazqnua7k5nqkxojddfhkrw4.us-east-1.cloudsearch.amazonaws.com CLOUDSEARCH_SEARCH_ENDPOINT=search-mint-hdgvyg66mwvfnu46tzaszesh5u.us-east-1.cloudsearch.amazonaws.com CONTENT_BUCKET=brian-content-sba-gov ZIP_CODE_DYNAMODB_TABLE=ZipCodesLower NODE_ENV=test node local-testing/probe.js
scripts.test: CLOUDSEARCH_OFFICE_ENDPOINT=csoffice.test CLOUDSEARCH_SEARCH_ENDPOINT=cs.test CONTENT_BUCKET=my-bucket ZIP_CODE_DYNAMODB_TABLE=zipcodetable NODE_ENV=test mocha "src/**/*.test.js"
